title: .NET MAUI eBook Now Available – Enterprise Application Patterns
description: The Enterprise Application Patterns Using .NET MAUI eBook (available as a PDF or viewable online) is there to help introduce all of the great things that we can do with .NET MAUI.

title: Announcing Cross device SDK Developer Preview for building rich multi-device experiences on Android
description: This SDK abstracts away the intricacies involved with working with device discovery, authentication, and connection protocols, allowing you to focus on what matters most—building delightful user experiences and connecting these experiences across a variety of form factors and platforms.

title: Apple offers Xcode Cloud subscriptions to developers with plans starting at $15/month
description: Apple has confirmed that developers can now avail subscriptions for Xcode Cloud. The service has been undergoing a limited participation trial for a few months and was being beta tested for more than a year.

title: C# 6, you dirty dog!
Capturing screenshots in .NET MAUI
description: Screenshots, as the name implies, are photos that are taken of the screen of our device and allow us to capture exactly the scenario that we want in an application. In this case, we will learn how to implement that in our .NET MAUI applications in a super easy way!

title: Crypto.com mistakenly sent a customer $7.2 million instead of a $68 refund
Everything new in Apple's Swift
description: Apple's programming language Swift got a wide array of updates at WWDC 2022. Here's a roundup of the best features that are coming alongside iOS 16 and macOS Ventura very soon.

title: Hackers hide malware in James Webb telescope images

description: Learn about the essential features of the Auth0 Flutter SDK and how it helps developers build and secure Flutter iOS and Android applications.
